page.title: 10MEDIA
page.content: {Local Newspapers}are based in Trowbridge and Swindon which provide local reports of the area particularly relating to Lacock and Derry Hill.Even more specific news of the locality is provided in the{parish magazine}of the anglican church in Lacock. The{Independant Local Radio station,{Great Western Radio,}with its magnificent reception, understandably since its transmitting mast is in the centre of the area, provides much local news and community contact through phone in programmes and such like. {BBC Local Radio}is based in Bristol and reception is barely adequate.{BBC {national FM broadcasts}suffer from poor reception and are particularly affected by air traffic flying overhead from RAF Lyneham. {Television}reception is good.
